title: What Does BSR Mean For KDP Low Content Books?
description:
What Does BSR Mean For KDP Low Content Books? Understanding BSR - KDP Low Content Book Publishing is important to see if low content books are selling in that particular niche on all the Amazon Stores. - Get your own free templates ➡️ https://dreamcreativebee.com/

The best seller rank in amazon means that sales are being made. The lower the rank the better the sales. If no rank there is no sales.

When you know a niche has sales, you know the concept works and you can sell more low content books in that niche. If no sales then the concept is not working.
